name: Penny Farthing
description:
Penny Farthing is a trading game. You, the new bird in town, have had a terrible accident. Your Penny Farthing is in pieces. Luckily the kind folks of Flock's Town are willing to help. Make sure you find the items they're looking for, and in return they'll give you what you need. 

Made for Global Game Jam by:

Ben McInnes -  https://twitter.com/BsMcInnes 
Adoné Kitching - https://twitter.com/AdoneKitching
Jason Sutherland - https://twitter.com/DriftPrism
